circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Feltwell on an operation to Cologne. It was shot down by the German Flak and crashed in the district of Weiden in Cologne. All six crew members were killed. 
Crew:
Sgt Frederick Lionel Roy Wood, pilot, 
Sgt John Anthony Matetich, pilot, 
F/Sgt Neville Henry Welsh, observer, 
Sgt Arthur Service, wireless operator, 
Sgt Frederick Harry Worlledge, wireless operator, 
Sgt Donald Frederick Barkhouse, air gunner.
probable_cause: Shot down by the German Flak.
